content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
use nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) AS [result]
--examine data type of dataset 
--using strored procedure .here we will see datatypes allocated by synapse only .
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR='','',
        ROWTERMINATOR=''\n''
    ) 
    WITH (
           LocationID SMALLINT,
           Borough VARCHAR(15),
           Zone VARCHAR(50),
           service_zone VARCHAR(15)

         )AS [result]'

-- max length of each column of dataset 
SELECT
    max(LEN(LocationID)) as max_LocationID,
    max(LEN(Borough)) as max_Borough,
    max(LEN(Zone)) as max_Zone,
    max(LEN(service_zone)) as max_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) AS [result]

--- specify the data type explicitly 
SELECT
    * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
           LocationID SMALLINT,
           Borough VARCHAR(15),
           Zone VARCHAR(50),
           service_zone VARCHAR(15)

         )AS [result]

-- specify the collation 
--check collections applied on database
select name ,collation_name from sys.databases;
--column level collation :
--Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8

SELECT
    * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
           LocationID SMALLINT ,
           Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
           Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8,
           service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8

         )AS [result]

--Database level collation :
--check we should run after implemnting collation :
select name ,collation_name from sys.databases;

--create database for nyc_taxi_discovery
create DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;
use nyc_taxi_discovery;
ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8; 
--once we done with colltion on database level then no column level collection needs to be specified
SELECT
    * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
           LocationID SMALLINT ,
           Borough VARCHAR(15),
           Zone VARCHAR(50),
           service_zone VARCHAR(15)

         )AS [result]



--- reading data from none header file 
SELECT
    * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) WITH (
             -- here we are just doing select desired columns as req. using WITH 
           service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4,
           Zone VARCHAR(50) 3
         )
    AS [result]

--- renamin the columns as per standards 
SELECT
    * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
WITH (
           location_id SMALLINT 1,
           borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
           zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
           service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4

         )AS [results]


--- create extreanl data source 
CREATE EXTERNAL data SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
with(
    LOCATION='https://synapseciurseadls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/'
) 
--similary we should create EXTRENAL DATA SOURCE FOR "Silver" and "Gold" as well.
--- query using data_source paramater in openrowset() slight parameterizations
--external data source helps to make query more switcable bw prod ,test, dev Env. 
SELECT
    * 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW = 2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) 
WITH (
           location_id SMALLINT 1, --renaming column using ordinal position 
           borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
           zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
           service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4

         )AS [results]

---query external data source 
select name,location from sys.external_data_sources;
